emails.added_to_roster_subject: You have been added to a roster
emails.added_to_roster_text: Hello %s Somebody added you to %s team's roster on Sportfolios. Click on the following button to see the current roster.
emails.cart_item_added_player_text: Your team %s is now officially registered to %s. You can now go pay your indivdual fees in your cart
emails.email_confirmation_text: To confirm your email, please click on the following button
emails.import_member_text: %s has invited you to become a member of their organization. Enter this code in your settings: %s
emails.person_registration_to_admin_subject: New registration to your tournament | Sportfolios
emails.person_registration_to_admin_text_no_spo: %s has registered to your event %s with success, no more spots remaining. You can access to your event here
emails.person_registration_to_admin_text_one_sp: %s has registered to your event %s with success, only one spot remaining. You can access to your event here
emails.person_registration_to_admin_no_places_t: %s has registered to your event %s with success. You can access to your event here
emails.person_registration_to_admin_text: %s has registered to your event %s with success, %s spots remaining. You can access to your event here
emails.recovery_email_text: You forgot your password? Click here to get it back
emails.score_submission_request_text: Hello %s One of your game from the event %s just ended. Please submit your score on Sportfolios
emails.send_receipt_text: To see your receipt, click on the following button
emails.team_refused_registration_text: The event %s have refused the registration of your team %s. You can contact the organization of the event to have more information on your registration denial
emails.team_registration_free_text: Your team %s is officially registered to %s
emails.team_registration_text: Your team %s is officially registered to %s The event is awaiting your payment. You can pay it now
emails.team_registration_to_admin_subject: New registration to your tournament | Sportfolios
emails.team_registration_to_admin_text_no_spot: A new team named %s has registered to your event %s with success, no more spots remaining. You can access to your event here
emails.team_registration_to_admin_text_one_spot: A new team named %s has registered to your event %s with success, only one spot remaining. You can access to your event here
emails.team_registration_to_admin_text: A new team named %s has registered to your event %s with success, %s spots remaining. You can access to your event here
emails.team_registration_to_admin_no_places_tex: A new team named %s has registered to your event %s with success. You can access to your event here
emails.team_registration_pending_to_admin_text: A new team named %s has registered to your event %s and is awaiting your acceptation. You can access to your event here
emails.transfer_person_subject: %s wants to transfer a person to your account | Sportfolios
emails.transfer_person_text: %s wants to transfer the person %s on Sportfolios. Click on the following button to sign in and complete the transfer
